LANGUAGE.TROPARION: O holy Apostle Philip pray to the merciful God that He grant our souls remission of offences.
LANGUAGE.KONTAKION: O wonderous fisherman of the nations, and converser with the disciples of Christ, chosen of the Apostles, Philip today granteth the world plenteous healings and protecteth from evil those that praise him. Therefore let us cry out unto him: save thou all by thy prayers, O Apostle.
